abyss_deck.name: Abyssal Demon
abyss_deck.text: At the end of a players turn, teleport to a random player.

abyss_deck.name: Abyssal Sire
abyss_deck.text: At the end of a players turn, teleport all keepers to random players.

abyss_deck.name: Whip Drop
abyss_deck.text: The iconic |Abyssal whip| drop must be obtained from the denizens of the abyss, the |Abyssal sire| or |Abyssal demon|

abyss_deck.name: Warp
abyss_deck.text: Keepers in play will randomize who owns them.
